unsubscribe_greeting: Hi %s, would you like to unsubscribe?
unsubscribe_paragraph: If you want to unsubscribe, please click the button below.
unsubscribe_fail_greeting: Hi %s, the unsubscribe request has failed!
unsubscribe_fail_paragraph: If you still wish to unsubscribe, please try again or contact customer service.
unsubscribe_success_paragraph: Thank you for using our service. You are welcome to subscribe again in the future.
thanks_paragraph: Please visit Mio Member Center to subscribe to us.
